headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-8.19.0-d11943ab9f4d3382211a5b2a4c5ae8d287f9a8cf "the [?local=true] query parameter to get-aliases requests has no effect and will be removed in a future version", 299 Elasticsearch-8.19.0-d11943ab9f4d3382211a5b2a4c5ae8d287f9a8cf "this request accesses system indices: [.security-7, .tasks], but in a future major version, direct access to system indices will be prevented by default"
